titles.title: Expressing support for designation of April 28, 2012, as "Jon Faddis Day", and honoring his contribution as both a jazz musician and educator.
Expressing support for designation of April 28, 2012, as "Jon Faddis Day", and honoring his contribution as both a jazz musician and educator.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Supports the designation of a Jon Faddis Day (in honor of his contributions as a jazz musician and educator).
